content: the garment has a top down construction first is worked the collar in a ribbed pattern then the yoke with a rectangle raglan by increasing in 4 corners after the yoke is done it s divided into sleeves and body the 3 parts of the sweater are worked separately a ribbing edge is added for cuffs and bottom hem for the color bomb sweater i used left over yarn as written in the materials section i worked with many strands of yarn held together 2 strands of dk weight yarn category 3 or 3 strands of fingering weight yarn category 1 i got in the end with a category 4 worsted aran weight yarn considering that the sweater is worked with 8 mm crochet hook you can use yarn up to category 5 chunky combine any yarn you have and feel comfortable to work it with a 8 mm crochet hook and then check the gauge
